channel.title: Editing Vote Shop
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm editing my Vote Points Shop, and I'm adding Rogue into there, it has already been added, but when I buy it's only 0 vote points.. How do I change how many vote points it is? Thanks :D

item.title: Editing Vote Shop
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

Shopassistant.java find some of the other item ids and add it the code will look like

Case ####, Item Id
return ####; How much it costs

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Vote Shop
item.dc:creator: @K0y K0y
item.description:
@K0y wrote:

What base/revision is your server?
If it’s project insanity (or any 317 really), you can do this by modifying the shophandler class. In there you must change the specific shop ID to use the ‘vote points’ token string as a currency…
If you don’t understand what I’m saying, have a look at the other currencies set for specific shops… (pest control points, tokkul etc…)
Hope this helped

Read full topic
